===Adverb===

# [[unable]] to
#: {{zh-x|趕 '''不上'''|'''unable to''' catch up with}}

===Verb===
{{zh-verb}}

# to [[not]] go up; to [[not]] [[ascend]]

===Usage notes===
When placed behind a verb, 不上 has a meaning of "unable to achieve" + verb. The opposite to 不上 would be [[得上]] ("able to" + verb).
